title: Hard Working Farmers Manual Weeding On The vegetable Farm #satisfying #short

subtasks: Apply brakes to stop or slow down
Align tractor direction with field rows
Apply gentle steering inputs to maintain straight path
Adjust speed for optimal crop interaction
Overlap previous passes slightly to ensure coverage

tasks.task: Operate hay baler (assumed from multiple mentions)
subtasks: Initiator, prime the machine for operation
Manipulate levers to engage baling process
Tend to bales as they form, adjusting if necessary
Position bale grip and release mechanism
Unclog feed tubes or hoppers if necessary
